snippet.title: Skyfear | Spring Update Trailer (Dragon Arena Shooter)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/814330/Skyfear/
Learn more: https://playskyfear.com/docs/faq
Join the Discord server: https://discord.gg/ZqKKmtB2nW

Skyfear is an arena shooter with dragons featuring both single player and multiplayer dragon combat. Indie developer Protoria Studios is bringing Skyfear to Steam in 2024. Take control of customizable dragons is a 6 player dragon combat game that draws inspiration from classic 2000’s era shooters. It features single-player and multiplayer modes, and customizable battles that allow you to play by your own rules. It also promises responsive aerial manoeuvring and a variety of normal and special attacks. Available on Steam in 2024. indie game announced 2024. dragon game announced 2024. Dragon arena shooter.
